DOC.brief_summary: This study design evaluate feasibility telephone-based health coach self-management intervention young adult .
DOC.detailed_description: To address unmet need hypertension care young adult , MyHEART ( My Hypertension Education Reaching Target ) , multi-component hypertension intervention develop . Eligible patient identify via healthcare system 's electronic health record . Inclusion criterion include : 1 . 18-39 year old start study , 2. previous hypertension ICD-9 cod office visit 3. uncontrolled hypertension ( ≥140/90 mmHg ) base last ambulatory blood pressure reading . Exclusion criterion include pre-defined list co-morbidities , addition plan current pregnancy , health condition limit physical activity dietary change , current participation another study , plan leave area next three month . During feasibility study , participant continue receive usual hypertension care primary care provider . The intervention involve health coach call 3-month period use self-management module . The order module guide participant 's choice . All encounter document electronic health record . Patient acceptability home blood pressure monitor survey data acquire .
